column2:
autoplot(comps,loadings=TRUE,loadings.label=TRUE,data=pc,label=TRUE,colour='cluster')
mapdata <- left_join(world,pc,by=c("iso"="ISO"))
mapdata %>%
  ggplot(.) +
  geom_polygon(aes(long,lat,group = paste(region,group),fill=cluster),color="white") +
  theme_void() +
  coord_fixed(1) +
  scale_fill_discrete() +
  labs(title="Typology")
